definition: banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
child of a Manchu bannerman family (nobility)/(fig.) privileged brat

sentences.english: The flag was flapping about in the light wind.
sentences.chinese: 那面旗子在微风中飘动。

sentences.english: Fellow astronaut Liu Boming also emerged briefly from the capsule to hand Zhai the Chinese flag.
sentences.chinese: 他的同事刘伯明也从太空舱短暂探出来把旗子递给翟。

sentences.english: The flag was spread out in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 那面旗子在风中展开了。

sentences.english: The flag was ribboned by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 旗子被风吹成条条碎片。

sentences.english: She looked back at him, erect, her face like a strained flag.
sentences.chinese: 她回看他一眼，身子挺直，面孔象一面拉紧了的旗子。

sentences.english: The flag on the building was split by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 楼顶上的旗子被大风撕破了。

sentences.english: All the warships in port were fully dressed.
sentences.chinese: 在港的兵舰都挂了许多旗子作为装饰。

sentences.english: Fiftyfive flags freely flutter from the floating frigate.
sentences.chinese: 五十五面旗子在微微沉没的战舰上自在的飘荡。

sentences.english: Journalists and hundreds of consumers came to see what the story was behind the flag.
sentences.chinese: 记者和许多的消费者赶来想了解这面旗子背后的故事。

sentences.english: How many flags can you see?
At home the United States flag is paired with the presidential seal.
sentences.chinese: 在美国老家，旗子用总统的标志旗配成一对。

sentences.english: The Rattlers staked their claim to the ball field by planting their flag in it.
sentences.chinese: 响尾蛇队在球场上插上自己的旗子，将其据为己有。

sentences.english: Thereare probably a thousand of those little flags being stuck in the moon.
sentences.chinese: 他们有可能在月球上插上成千上万的小旗子。

sentences.english: The Great Hall of the People is beflagged.
sentences.chinese: 人民大会堂上插满旗子。

sentences.english: The girl was draped in the flag.

definition: banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]
the hammer and sickle (flag of USSR, symbolizing rural and proletarian labor)
